title: Helen Flanagan is impossible to miss in risqué LBD at Molly-Mae Hague's bash
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Helen Flanagan made quite the fashion statement at Molly-Mae Hague's Beauty launch.

The Coronation Street star, 29, got incredibly dolled up for her rare night on the tiles at Menagerie bar and Restaurant, in Manchester on Thursday.

All eyes were on the actress as she stepped out in a satin minidress which had bows stitched into the neckline and the one-sleeve of the number.

Corrie's Helen made her legs appear endless by pairing her LBD with a microscopic hemline and thigh-high PVC boots together.

The soap star got her glam on for the night out as she added a bright red lip and shimmering makeup to her pretty features.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

For a burst of colour, Helen toted a scarlet handbag to keep all her essentials in on her night out.

The actress enjoyed the company of her close friend Jay when they headed to the Love Island star's glittering bash.

Only the day before, she revealed she hadn't got any sleep because her daughter Delilah was suffering with teething problems.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

In the accompanying snap, the exhausted mother and daughter could be seen sleeping together on a bundle of blankets on the floor in the nursery.

She wrote: “The only way I could get any sleep last night at all with Delilah was to sleep on the nursery floor with blankets over us #teething.

“Morning to the parents living off coffee today x love you Delilah Pops.”

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Giovanna Fletcher and Samia Longchambon showed their support for the mum by leaving comments beneath her post.

Mummy blogger Giovanna, who is married to McFly's Tom, wrote: “Big love to you!!! Those nights are tough. Xxx.”

Coronation Street former actress Samia left kisses and heart emojis beneath the cosy picture.

Helen has devoted her time to raising her two daughters Delilah and Matilda whom she brings up with her fiancé Scott Sinclair.

She is best known for her role in Coronation Street as Rosie Webster on the cobbles.
description: Helen turned heads when she arrived at the Love Island star's bash in a minidress with huge bows sewn into the design
